About Me

I come from a city called St. Petersburg, Russia. I have been living in Poland for a good six years now. I am passionate about programming and foreign languages. I also like to travel around Europe.

My journey with programming began when I realised I want some changes in my life. I've become interested in web development (especially in Frontend) after seeing how powerful this tool is and how many it hides from us. Being able to build something from scratch is a fantastic feeling. I got interested in Javascript, especially React. In the future, I would like to go deep and work with Backend technologies.

I'm determined to learn more and work hard on my soft- and hardskills to become a better developer.
